title: "VISION is coming home to Stuttgart in October 2021"
excerpt: "VISION (5 to 7 October 2021) is the world's leading trade fair for machine vision. The \"Who's who\" in the machine vision will also meet at VISION this year and provide a unique overview of the entire range of machine vision products and services together with insights into current and future technologies."
